product_name: The North Face A-Back Hybrid Down Vest - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face A-Back Hybrid down vest hits the sweet spot between too much warmth and too little, offering crucial insulation to your core without inhibiting movement while you're on the go. Premium 700-fill down is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) side panels optimize breathability and provide a slim, flattering fit. The North Face A-Back Hybrid down vest features 2 zippered hand pockets for easy storage and 1 internal zippered pocket that secures small essentials. This item is part of the North Face Summit Series(TM), apparel designed and tested for use in harsh environments. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face A-Back Hybrid down vest hits the sweet spot between too much warmth and too little, offering crucial insulation to your core without inhibiting movement while you're on the go.
